body.p: The General Settings page includes an option to delete a site configuration. You must be the Owner of the site configuration to access this option.

To delete the site configuration, click the Delete button and you will asked to confirm the deletion (if you are logged in with an email and password rather than with social media credentials, you will also be asked to enter your password to proceed).Using this action will delete all versions and comments for the site configuration and this action cannot be reversed.
